global_instructions.source_of_truth: Use only facts from the uploaded PDF. If information is missing, write: 'Information not available at time of assessment.' Do not guess.
global_instructions.style: Objective, concise, payer-compliant. Use full sentences. Avoid jargon and speculation.
global_instructions.compliance_focus: Include frequency, intensity, duration, and functional impairment when relevant. Explain why lower level of care is insufficient when risk is present.
global_instructions.dates_times: Use ISO dates when exact dates are present in the PDF; otherwise, keep narrative without inventing dates.
